title: SECLI - CLIENT IT CONTROLS GENERATION / FILES EXTRACTION
time_sequence: CH - DATA VALIDATION IN TEST ENVIRONMENT

task_list.instruction_title: Check Error message coming from BUS ( ATLAS SPOC_INTEGRATION ERROR)

Phase: PostSECLI on SECLI-TEST

ENGINE to generate the list of CONTROLS  : 
C2500 - Number of Tiers per ENTITY_TYPE
C2504 - Number of Tiers per CURRENCY - TYPE - MANAGEMENT_TYPE
C2520 - Number of accounts held by individuals
C2540 - Number of accounts held by legal entities
C2541 - Number of companies by company type
C2560.3 - Number of physical person with role 3 active procured on active third-party (nr persons and nr third party) per company
C2715 - Number of addresses per country [Nombre d'adresses par pays]
C2720 - Number of persons per country of nationality
C2740 - Number of persons per country of domicile
C2757 - Instructions without a blocking code
C2780 - Number of accounts by language
C2800.1 - Number of accounts in each reporting frequency
C2800.2 - Number of accounts by frequency of production of estimates
C2840 - Number of accounts by pool US TAX
C2880 - Breakdown count of managed 'account' per risk profil 
C2940 - Breakdown count of documents types per 'account'
C3143 - Number of accounts managed by a particular and per management type (normally SUIVI) [follow-up if not suivi?]
C3147 - Number of accounts and their rubric
C3150 - Number of tiers per country of nationality of the main holder
C3151 - Number of tiers per country of domicile of the main holder
C3157 - Number of persons with/without legal adress
C3163 - Number of accounts per type of management
C3195 - Number of accounts with no currency or with no economic sector
C3197 - Number of mailing instructions with no adress associated or no holdmail associated
C4003 - Nombre de personnes avec passeport ou carte d'identité
C4013 - Number of accounts per MiFID category
C4017 - Number of persons by role
C4019 - Number of persons by MIFID knowledge & experience
